item.title: Rockbox Scrobbler
item.description:
rb-scrobbler is a program I wrote in Go which takes in a log of songs listened to on an MP3 player running rockbox custom firmware and submits them with accurate timestamps to music tracking website last.fm.

More information, code and downloads available at GitHub

Licensed under GPL3
